## Baixar ou atualizar material

```
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("curso-r/CursoR")

CursoR::atualizar_material()
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::kable(escape = FALSE,
  tibble::tibble(
    slide = CursoR:::list_github_files("intro-ml-mestre", "slides/", "\\.html"),
    link = paste0("https://curso-r.github.io/intro-ml-mestre/", slide)
  ) %>%
    mutate(
      Slides = glue::glue("<a href='{link}'>{slide}</a>")
    ) %>% 
    select(Slides)
)
```
